version_description:
We’ve been working hard to make our app even better for you!
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
Top-up any prepaid phone in over 130 countries instantly.

We’ve been working hard to make our app even better for you!
- iOS 8 bug fix
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

- New: Clearer messaging about applied promo codes during top-up flow and checkout

- Fixed issues that in rare cases could cause the app to crash

Recent updates:
- Added Touch ID support

Top-up any prepaid phone in over 130 countries instantly.

Latest updates:
- New: Updated icons and welcome message on home screen
- New: Added operator promotions to amounts screen
- New: Clear messaging about applied operator promotions displayed throughout top-up flow and checkout
- Bug fixes and performance tweaks
- Fixed issues that in rare cases could cause the app to crash

Recent updates:
- Added Touch ID support

- New: You can now edit your saved credit cards using the “Saved cards” option in “My Account” in the menu
- Bug fixes and performance tweaks
- Fixed issues that in rare cases could cause the app to crash

Your favorite top-up app just got a brand-new look. Update now to experience the fastest and best-looking Ding app yet.
What’s new?
- Resend top-ups to your recent recipients in a few simple taps
- See the latest promotions when choosing your top-up destination
- A few extra technical bits based on your feedback
We’re always working to deliver the best top-up experience possible. Turn on auto-updates to make sure you always have the latest way to send top-up to your friends and family.

Update and get access to the latest and greatest Ding features!
• Top-up Reminders: set a Reminder in the More section.
• Dedicated Account section: make it personal.
• Edit payment methods: edit your saved payment methods.
And as always, top-up 500+ operators in more than 140 countries.

Something exciting is coming! This update prepares your app for a new feature coming soon. Update now and you'll be ready when it arrives! Don't forget, your Ding app is packed with lots of great features including:
• Top-up Reminders: set a Reminder in the More section.
• Dedicated Account section: make it personal.
• Edit payment methods: edit your saved payment methods.
And as always, top-up 500+ operators in more than 140 countries.
Simple, speedy, secure.

Update and get access to the latest and greatest Ding features!
• Top-up Reminders: set a Reminder in the More section.
• Dedicated Account section: make it personal.
• Edit payment methods: edit your saved payment methods.
And as always, top-up 500+ operators in more than 140 countries.
Top-up locked down? In this version, we've made it even easier to reset your password, plus some other technical tweaks to get things ready for iOS 13.
We’ve just added Dark Mode, so now you can Ding in the dark! This release also includes Apple Sign In, making it even easier to register or pick up where you left off.
We’ve just added Dark Mode, so now you can Ding in the dark! This release also includes Apple Sign In, making it even easier to register or pick up where you left off.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements. Top-up any prepaid phone in over 140 countries instantly.

This update is all about you. We’ve made it easier than ever to top-up your own phone, and added faster access to our Help Centre and 24/7 support team. There’s lots more coming in 2020, so keep an eye on your App Store in the new year. Happy holidays!

Our aim is to make this app even better, that’s why we constantly make tweaks to improve our performance. We want your experience to be smooth and enjoyable, so make sure you have your updates turned on and you’ll never miss a thing.

So what is new?

Our app loads faster
We’ve made changes for a more seamless top-up
